author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Haitong International Securities Group Says ‍Ji Yuguang Will Retire As Chairman​
text:
Feb 8 (Reuters) - Haitong International Securities Group Ltd :
* ‍QU QIUPING HAS BEEN APPOINTED AS CHAIRMAN​ * ‍JI YUGUANG WILL RETIRE AS CHAIRMAN​ * ‍POON MO YIU HAS BEEN RE-DESIGNATED FROM NON-EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR TO EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
